message: For $10000, you're getting a unique opportunity to own a product with exclusive features designed to enhance your daily experience. While it may not be perfect, we're confident it will add value to your life.
I'm not convinced by your marketing pitch. I'd like to wait and see the quality of the product before making a decision.
